FOUND IN: Numeri joined Harvard University as an Assistant Professor of Mathematics at its prestigious mathematics department, where her expertise was widely recognized, earning her numerous awards including the Fields Medal (shared with other mathematicians) in recognition for her exceptional work on algebraic structures and number theory.
